name: Cee Ann - Copycat
description:
Play an action game that combines the speed and fighting system, with a level of RPG components to be able to buy new moves with points, All in a platform where you have to master all the elements from the stage to win.

Fight as Cee Ann, a dynamic robo-cat with abilites to push to the maximum!

Use energy cores to unlock skills or swap points for another, up to you which suits best at gameplay.

You can choose to use a sword or the robot as gun.

Combat Moves:

  • Slide
  • Punch
  • Kick
  • Uppercut
  • Spiral Kick

Dynamic Moves:

  • Dash
  • Backflip
  • Hook Jump
  • Air Dash
  • Wall Sprint

Supports Gamepad controllers

Thanks for reading!

Feedback is appreciated!

Hint: Double tap and hold the movement keys to start running in a direction or another. (Implemented in this version only)

What's new?

  • Final preview of the character in the skill menu
  • Pressing the LB/L1 button on the gamepad will swap to sword
  • Pressing the back/select button on the gamepad will zoom the screen X2 and viceversa

What's next in development?

  • The guest character at stage 1
  • Character select for versus mode
  • Polishing the skill menu
  • Polishing on the last details of the hud
  • Scenes of the story
  • Bugfixing on enemies
  • Gamepad support in main menu
